    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet Company_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Company_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Company_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Company objID="company_1" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
    <CompanyRef>company_1</CompanyRef>
    <Name code="AI" codeContext="Example String Value" department="Adventure department" description="Example String Value" division="Travel Division" shortName="Adventure Inc">Travel Adventure Partners Incorporated</Name>
    <AddressDetail language="en" role="Home" validInd="true">
        <AddressLine>111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland</AddressLine>
        <BldgRoom buldingInd="true">Bldg H</BldgRoom>
        <Number pO_Box="98567499" ruralRouteNmbr="88" streetDirection="NNW" streetNmbrSuffix="B">563</Number>
        <Street>Travers Street</Street>
        <City>Dublin</City>
        <County>Fairfax</County>
        <StateProv name="Texas">TX</StateProv>
        <Country name="Ireland">IR</Country>
        <PostalCode>32165-9999</PostalCode>
        <Remark>This address should be used for all official correspondences.</Remark>
        <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
        <Type>Business</Type>
        <Use>Billing</Use>
    </AddressDetail>
    <TelephoneDetail areaCityCode="202" countryAccessCode="01" defaultInd="true" extension="237" id="telephone_1" pIN="1234" phoneNumber="5555555" remark="Don't call after 10:00PM" role="Home">
        <Privacy optInDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" optInStatus="OptedOut" optOutDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" shareMarketInd="Inherit" shareSyncInd="Yes"/>
        <PhoneLocationType>Brand reservations office</PhoneLocationType>
        <PhoneTechType>Voice</PhoneTechType>
        <PhoneUseType>Contact</PhoneUseType>
    </TelephoneDetail>
    <Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
        <Address>Example String Value</Address>
        <Type>Business</Type>
        <Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="Unknown" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="No" shareSyncInd="Inherit"/>
    </Email>
    <URL defaultInd="true" type="Example String Value">http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00</URL>
</Company>

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Name
        Detailed name information for the company.
        Details
        Type CompanyName
        Example Value Travel Adventure Partners Incorporated
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 20
        Address
        A jurisdiction in which a company is authorized to do business. Uses the Address entity to indicate the location of business using any of the components of the address (e.g., city, state, zip code, country).
        Details
        Type Address
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100
        Telephone
        Information about a telephone number, including the actual number and its usage.
        Details
        Type Telephone
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100
        Email
        Electronic email addresses, in IETF specified format.
        Details
        Type Email
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100
        URL
        Information on a URL for the company.
        Details
        Type URL
        Example Value http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100
